page.title: 20Farming / Credits.
page.content: As most of our block is grassland, the main source of occupation is farming. The bulk of the farm animals are sheep and cattle, hens and chickens. The cattle are reared for dairy farming, whilst the sheep and poultry are reared to provide food in the form of meat and eggs. These animals graze on enclosed rough grazing land. Other land consists of intensively managed grassland,providing sileage. There are four silos situated in the near vicinity of our school. Two of our photographs for the Domesday Project were taken from the top of a silo. Credits.Names of people contributing to this text were :- Mr.B.W.Fish.Headmaster.Mr.J.Hayhurst. Mrs J.Lamb.Claire McVey.David Lowther. Justine Pomfret.Cheryl Smith. Andrew Partington.Stuart Hunter.
